title: Decked Out
author: verias
text:
William seems to be gearing up for something. I wonder where he could be going.

Any guesses or ideas?

Also, yay more wrist healing has been done. Only a small amount of pain after prolonged working, so hopefully it'll be all good in another week or so.

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Is he going to visit his grandma in the forest? :p
